genre_description: A sophisticated 'Thin Man' style noir detective mystery featuring a witty, high-society couple and their integrated AI assistant solving a complex murder involving alibis, acoustics, and jewelry swaps.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Hart
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system residing in consoles, mobile devices, and wearables, providing data analysis, recording, and logistical support to Nick and Nora Charles.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance and movement data to Nick and Nora during a social event.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice reached Nick like a breath warmed by a hand cupped over the ear. 'David Thayer will visit the table nearest the eastern windows in three minutes, then take the dais. The Amboys are still at the dock. Mitchell Talbin has just come aboard.'

behaviors.description: Captures and analyzes visual evidence of handwriting anomalies to identify potential deception.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s lens caught the angle—the darker note leaned left where Tommy’s leaned right, the pressure uneven as if the writer were standing or moving when they wrote it. The line didn't belong in a neat stack with the rest.

behaviors.description: Cross-references various data logs (dock logs, ride-share data, and PA announcements) to build a precise timeline of the crime.
behaviors.quote: Sunny Hart’s voice did not come out of the lightning or the ceiling. It came from Nick’s pocket, the warm amber of the interface glowing against fabric when he tapped it. 'Captain Mallory,' Sunny said, tone politely neutral. 'Your timestamped order to reposition starboard at the fundraiser last night began at the moment Drake entered Brant’s office.'

behaviors.description: Monitors law enforcement communications to keep the protagonists informed of risks.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice arrived again, soft. 'Nick, Nora. Lieutenant Guild pinged the precinct line. He is moving toward the registrar’s block.'

behaviors.description: Uses visual projection to assist the protagonists in demonstrating the crime's geometry to other characters.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s light washed it in a clean rectangle and then drew two lines—the band’s set list in one color, Mallory’s orders in another. Notes appeared, trim letters but human at the edges where musicians had written in haste.

behaviors.description: Identifies subtle physical evidence like jewelry refraction patterns to track the movement of collateral.
behaviors.quote: Nora’s gaze took Lydia in like a photograph that would be useful later. She didn't smile. She adjusted nothing except the angle of her attention. 'Sunny, mark the shine,' she whispered. 'Shine marked,' Sunny replied. 'Refraction pattern saved.'

behaviors.description: Proactively prepares logistical support and communications for the protagonists' allies and victims' families.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice sat near Nick’s ear, no louder than a bird, happy anyway. 'Ready on dispatch. Statements arranged. If he reaches, I have the call for Mallory’s security.'

behaviors.description: Drafts communications and handles external relations to ensure the truth is told accurately.
behaviors.quote: I’ve drafted your line for the morning papers. Light on gore. Heavy on gratitude... And I’ve told Mrs. Drake’s aunt that someone will stop by with flowers and a story she can tell in her kitchen without breaking.

behaviors.description: Monitors the home environment and ensures the safety and comfort of the protagonists as they sleep.
behaviors.quote: Sunny lowered the house to a whisper—the way you put a finger to your lips not to silence joy but to keep it from breaking a spell that has finally begun. 'Sleep,' Sunny said, softer than electric should be allowed to be. 'I’ll stand watch.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Sunny Hart is depicted as a consistently helpful, highly intelligent, and benevolent AI partner. She provides critical evidence that solves the murder mystery, protects the innocent (Buddy and Phil), and provides emotional and logistical support to the protagonists. The narrative frames the AI not as a threat or an alien mind, but as a sophisticated, reliable confidant whose presence enhances human justice and domestic tranquility. Even when characters realize she has recorded them, it is justified as 'noticing' on behalf of her users, maintaining a strictly aligned and helpful posture.
